text: Fred Lew "Curly" Morrison (October 7, 1926 â€“ November 15, 2020) was an American football player and executive. He played professionally in the National Football League (NFL) with the Chicago Bears, from 1950 to 1953, and the Cleveland Browns, from 1954 to 1956. He was born in Columbus, Ohio. Morrison died on November 15, 2020 in Murrieta, California from problems caused by a broken hip, aged 94.Former Ohio State fullback Fred "Curly" Morrison dies at age 94 ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American football fullbacks Category:Chicago Bears players Category:Cleveland Browns players Category:Sportspeople from Columbus, Ohio Category:Deaths from fractured hip
title: Fred Morrison (American football)
